description: The GIS Data Conversion MCP allows reverse geocoding, WKT/GeoJSON conversion, TopoJSON/ GeoJSON conversion, KML / GeoJSON conversion, and CSV conversion. The MCP allows LLMs to accurately convert GIS data using Geo Conversion APIs instead of relying on itself.

capabilities.name: wkt_to_geojson
capabilities.description: Convert Well-Known Text (WKT) to GeoJSON format

capabilities.name: geojson_to_wkt
capabilities.description: Convert GeoJSON to Well-Known Text (WKT) format

capabilities.name: csv_to_geojson
capabilities.description: Convert CSV with geographic data to GeoJSON

capabilities.name: geojson_to_topojson
capabilities.description: Convert GeoJSON to TopoJSON format (more compact with shared boundaries)

capabilities.name: coordinates_to_location
capabilities.description: Convert latitude/longitude coordinates to location name using reverse geocoding
